name: Cakingdom Match
description:
"Cakingdom Match" is a brand new match 3 game with fun new game modes, brilliant graphics, and most importantly, skillful companions.

Your companions are waiting for you in your journey of Cakingdom - Join this match 3 puzzle game to make friends with them! These companions can create sweet power-ups or break the blockers to help you beat the levels!

Start playing "Cakingdom Match" now with over hundreds of enjoyable levels and millions of players around the world. Cakingdom is a classic and addictive match-three puzzle game with amazing gameplay, interesting game modes-gummy bear, jam, magic hat, juice gummy, brilliant graphics! Cakingdom is become one of the most popular match 3 game of all time by diverse features and regular updates.


Cakingdom Match Features:
-Hundreds of levels to play – find your companions along your journey!
-Unique Gameplay: play match 3 to collect stickers and unlock skillful companions- Oven Robot, Dragon, Rock Rabbit, Panda...
-Funny events and rewards: Tournament, leaderboard, Daily Quests, Daily Reward.
-Sweet game modes: slice party cake, dunk the popsicles, spread jam, collect gummy bears!
-Brand new boosters: timed juice gummy, time paper plane… can help automatically without using moves or gold bars!
-In-game social network: Join clans and get more lives from your clan mates, fight together in clan tournament to get big prizes!
-Easy to play, online and offline, everywhere. Only need three minutes to play a level.
-Connect to Facebook to sync game data and share lives with your friends.

Cakingdom Story:
Mr. Oberlin, a baking robot, is the team leader of Cakingdom Technology Force. However, he fell into the Earth accidentally in the 1st Honey War, which is a war between Cakingdom and Candy Tribe for honey.   One day, he received the calling signal from Meredith princess for joining the 3rd Honey war. Then, he used the last remaining energy to send back to Sweet Planet, however, also brought Amy together.

Here begins Amy’s sweet journey in Cakingdom, she is finding the way to go home. On her journey, she meet many skillful and kind companions…
